alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:48PM CST until February 03 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Arkansas... White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. For the Lower White River...including Newport, Augusta, Georgetown, Des Arc, Clarendon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY, FEBRUARY 03... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Augusta. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday, February 03. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Farm ground along the river in White and Woodruff counties begin to flood. Seasonal agricultural impacts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 25.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning to a crest of 27.0 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, February 02. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun White River Augusta 26.0 25.8 Wed 9 pm CST 26.4 26.6 26.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 1000 PM CST.
